correspondence.message: I have a question regarding the latest date to register for my thesis so that I can finish it within the upcoming winter semester. Will I still be able to submit my thesis if I register in the first week of October?"

If you register your thesis in October, you must submit it six months later in March, which is before the summer semester starts. However, please note that your graduation documents will not be ready by then. You can submit your thesis earlier if you complete it ahead of time.
